meanings.definition: Relating to or involving multiple axes.
meanings.sent1: The multiaxial joystick allowed the pilot to control the aircraft in various ways.
meanings.sent2: The multiaxial survey measured data from different perspectives.
meanings.sent3: The multiaxial camera could capture images from all angles, even upside down!
meanings.sent4: Her multiaxial thinking enabled her to consider problems from different viewpoints.
meanings.sent5: The multiaxial compass pointed in every direction, making navigation easy.

meanings.definition: Capable of movement in multiple directions.
meanings.sent1: The robot had a multiaxial arm that could reach any spot on the assembly line.
meanings.sent2: The multiaxial joint in the human body allows for flexible movements.
meanings.sent3: The multiaxial robot danced in all directions, impressing the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her multiaxial flexibility in yoga class amazed everyone.
meanings.sent5: The multiaxial wheels on the skateboard made it easy to perform tricks.
